wikipedia_page.main: Nicola Ann "Nicki" Harding (born 12 June 1982) is an English female football defender. She last played for Manchester City Ladies in the FA WSL, having been part of Liverpool's squad in the 2011 FA WSL and 2012 FA WSL. Although primarily a full-back, comfortable on either the right or left, she can also play in a more advanced midfield role.
